label: advisoryID
comment: The unique ID of the advisory entity corresponding to this observation.

label: cropDiseaseInfo
comment: The disease related information of the crop corresponding to this observation.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: cropNameLocal
comment: The common/local name of the crop species corresponding to the observation.

label: cropCodeICC
comment: The unique code assigned for the crop species as per the ICC (International Crop Classification) of FAO (Food and Agicultural Organisation).

label: cropVarietyName
comment: The variations within the plant species either naturally or developed in research station.

label: cropSeason
comment: The season in which the crop species is planted and harvested. ENUM [Kharif, Rabi, Zaid].

label: mediaURL
comment: Link(s) to any image(s) or media of the entity or incident corresponding to this observation

label: advisoryNature
comment: The nature of adivsory correspnoding to this observation.

label: advisoryChannel
comment: The channel(s) for communicating the advisory information to reach a larger group of people.

label: natureOfProblem
comment: The problem for which the advisory has been issued to the people. such as flood, cyclone, insects attack, diseases, etc.

label: fileFormat
comment: Format of the media file corresponding to this observation.
